alert.note: Alert for Alger; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 9:46PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Heavy snow showers through late evening in far eastern Marquette County and western Alger County... Heavy snow showers will stream onshore from around Shot Point east to near Munising through 11 PM EST. These snow showers will extend inland to Sundell, Chatham and Trenary. Expect snowfall rates of 1 to 3 inches per hour at times with visibility as low as one-quarter of a mile in the heavy snow showers. These heavy snow showers will drift east to around Munising during the night. If you have travel plans during the late evening, be alert for rapid changes in road conditions and visibility. Drive at reduced speeds. M-28 from around Shot Point to Munising, US-41 from Kiva to Trenary and M-94 west of Munising will be affected by the heavy snow showers.
